      • checkRoom

        public boolean checkRoom(java.lang.String room,
                         java.lang.String eventID)
        Checks if a room is available for an event.
        Parameters:
        room - the room ID for the room
        eventID - the event ID of the event
        Returns:
        True iff the room is a valid number, exists and there is no other event using the room at the time, otherwise returns False.
